text: with AXA operating in over 60 countries
and with over 100 operating companies
and entities it was important that we
created technical standards using global
landing zones provided by AWS to ensure
consistency across our organization and
helped us to avoid reinventing the wheel
in each and every single entity the
global landing zone is a set of tools
automation and concepts that allow any
entity that wants to use a double your
services to very quickly access them in
a secure and compliant manner
it covers aspects like encryption
network configuration I am integration
and logging and monitoring of compliance
we've deployed the global landing zone
now in more than 350 areas accounts of
AXA and it's one of the cornerstones of
our cloud migration so we have around
six six thousand illegible applications
that we want to migrate to the cloud and
so far in 2090 we've achieved 25 percent
of that volume to move to the cloud we
have a technology strategy we have cloud
being one of the key pillars within that
and using AWS services we've managed to
execute a number of projects for example
in acts Italy we use AWS services to
help us on our fraud detection
capabilities for our axle German
business our property and casualty
department can now develop new products
in matter of days when historically used
to take us months just to get the idea
infrastructure ready with the global
landing zone concept we allowed the
entities to have a high level of
autonomy while at the same time being
able to control and to ensure a certain
level of standardization we implement
new products in a far faster time we're
utilizing new features such as machine
learning chat BOTS and lots of business

provides that we couldn't do in the past
